description:
Noriko Takaya dreams of being a space pilot just like her father was, but is thrown a curveball when a mysterious new coach arrives at her school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Incroyable ! Amano et moi sommes pilotes
Shock! Io e la Signorina, piloti spaziali?!
Shock! Watashi to Onee-sama ga Pilot!?
Unbelievable! Amano and I Are Pilots?!
ช๊อค! นักบินคือฉันกับคุณพี่งั้นเหรอ!?
ショック! 私とお姉様がパイロット!?
